page.title: 08The Headlanders Jazz Band
page.content: {The Headland-H/pool By Angela Donkin In 1984 I joined the jazz band.I go away every week to places like Ushaw Moor,Redhall,Ferryhill and lots of other places.Our uniform is blue and white.We have a blue sash and a white belt.I have 18 medals at the moment.We practice every Wednesday in the Central Hall.Donna plays the cazoo.The other instruments are cymbals,drums, glocks and a big drum.We have a mascot and leaders.Our trainers are Vera, Cliff and Pat.Some people in the band have more than 200 medals.We have to pay 50p every Wednesday and that goes towards our uniforms and petrol for our bus journeys.
